name: mttt-local-tracker
description: Multi-Task Time Tracker with local file persistence - Refactored and improved.

scripts.backup: mkdir -p backups && cp mtt-*.json backups/backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test: echo "Error: Tests not yet implemented. Run 'npm run test:setup' to set up testing." && exit 1
scripts.test:setup: echo "To add tests, install: npm install --save-dev jest" && echo "Then create tests in test/ directory"
